title: WL Martin Plan 24446
summary: Modern farmhouse with board-and-batten exterior options and efficient two-story layout.
description: Plan 24446 delivers farmhouse charm with contemporary functionality. The welcoming front porch leads into an open main level where kitchen, dining, and living spaces flow together. Upstairs bedrooms provide private retreats while the owner's suite offers a peaceful escape. This design emphasizes WL Martin's commitment to efficient space planning and outdoor living integration.
